scripts.build: npm install && mkdir -p config && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const content = 'const config = { email: process.env.EMAIL_USER || \'placeholder@example.com\', password: process.env.EMAIL_PASSWORD || \'placeholder_password\', host: process.env.EMAIL_HOST || \'smtp.gmail.com\', port: process.env.EMAIL_PORT || 587 }; module.exports = config;'; if (!fs.existsSync('./config/email.js')) { fs.writeFileSync('./config/email.js', content); }" && npm run lint:check
